name: Hydron-QT  Shock Wave Therapy Unit
descr:
High Tech ESWT Shock Wave Therapy Unit.

The Biological Principle of Shock Wave Treatment: changes in permeability of endothelium, changes in permeability of the cell membrane, changes in the mitochondria, formation of free radicals, releasing of NO (nitrogen monoxide), flushing of of substance P neurotransmitter, releasing of various growth factors-VEGF (vessel endothelial growth factor)

The Biological Effect of Shock Wave Treatment: alter cell metabolism, mechanical stimulation of neovascularization, revitalize degenerative tissue, resorb calcific deposits.
